summary: WHEN STOPPED AT TRAFFIC LIGHT, POWER STEERING WARNING LIGHTS CAME ON.  CAR DID NOT HAVE POWER STEERING.  TURNED CAR OFF AND THEN BACK ON.  WARNED LIGHTS CAME BACK ON AND NOT POWER STEERING.  TURNED CAR OFF FOR APPROXIMATELY 3 TO 4 MINUTES, WARNING LIGHTS DID NOT COME BACK ON AND POWER STEERING SEEMED TO BE WORKING.  PULLED CAR INTO PARKING LOT AND DROVE AROUND PARKING LOT FOR SEVERAL MINUTES.  POWER STEERING WORKING AND NOT WARNING LIGHTS ON.  PULLED BACK ON MAIN ROAD (9:30 P.M.) AND WHEN REACHED APPROXIMATELY 25 MPH, WARNING LIGHTS CAME BACK AND NOT POWER STEERING IN CAR.  PULL OVER AND HAD CAR TOWED IN FOR SERVICE.
